name: Arnold Palmer
quote: Success in this game depends less on strength of body than strength of mind and character.

name: Arnold Palmer
quote: I have a tip that can take five stroke off anyone's game. It's called an eraser

name: Arnold Palmer
quote: Golf is deceptively simple and endlessly complicated; it satisfies the soul and frustrates the intellect. It is at the same time rewarding and maddening – and it is without a doubt the greatest game mankind has ever invented.

name: Arnold Palmer
quote: The game has such a hold on golfers because they compete not only against an opponent, but also against the course, against par, and most surely - against themselves.

name: Arnold Palmer
quote: Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.

name: Arnold Palmer
quote: Putting is like wisdom – partly a natural gift and partly the accumulation of experience.

name: Sergio Garcia
quote: If you worry about making bogeys, it makes the game that much more difficult. You put more pressure on yourself without even noticing it. It makes a difference to take it easy when things aren’t going right.

name: Sergio Garcia
quote: There’s no such thing as bad weather, only inappropriate clothing!

name: P.G Wodehouse
quote: Golf… is the infallible test. The man who can go into a patch of rough alone, with the knowledge that only God is watching him, and play his ball where it lies, is the man who will serve you faithfully and well.

name: Gary Player
quote: A good golfer has the determination to win and the patience to wait for the breaks.

name: Jack Nicklaus
quote: Arnold’s place in history will be as the man who took golf from being a game for the few to a sport for the masses. He was the catalyst who made that happen.

name: Jack Nicklaus
quote: Resolve never to quit, never to give up, no matter what the situation

name: Jack Nicklaus
quote: The older you get the stronger the wind gets — and it's always in your face.

name: Jack Nicklaus
quote: Learn the fundamentals of the game and stick to them. Band-Aid remedies never last.

name: Jack Nicklaus
quote: Professional golf is the only sport where, if you win 20% of the time, you're the best.

name: Jack Nicklaus
quote: Sometimes the biggest problem is in your head. You've got to play a shot instead of wondering where your next bad shot is coming from.

name: Jack Nicklaus
quote: Confidence is the single most important factorin the game. No matter how great your natural talent, there is only one way to obtain and sustain it: work.

name: Jack Nicklaus
quote: It takes hundreds of good golf shots to gain confidence, but only one bad one to lose it.

name: Dr Bob Rotella
quote: Golf is about how well you accept, respond to, and score with your misses much more so than it is a game of your perfect shots.

name: Gary Player
quote: The more I work and practice, the luckier I seem to get.

name: Bobby Jones
quote: One reason golf is such an exasperating game is that a thing we learned is so easily forgotten, and we find ourselves struggling year after year with faults we had discovered and corrected time and again.

name: Harry Vardon
quote: For this game you need, above all things, to be in a tranquil frame of mind.

name: Ben Hogan
quote: As you walk down the fairway of life you must smell the roses, for you only get to play one round.

name: Ben Sayers
quote: A good player who is a great putter is a match for any golfer. A great hitter who cannot putt is a match for no one.

name: Bubba Watson
quote: Everybody can see that my swing is homegrown. That means everybody has a chance to do it.

name: Sam Snead
quote: Forget your opponents; always play against par.

name: P.G Wodehouse
quote: To find a man’s true character, play golf with him.

name: Jack Benny
quote: Give me golf clubs, fresh air and a beautiful partner, and you can keep the clubs and the fresh air.

name: Lee Trevino
quote: You don’t know what pressure is until you play for five bucks with only two bucks in your pocket.

name: Raymond Floyd
quote: They call it golf because all the other four letter words were taken.

name: Bobby Jones
quote: Golf is the closest game to the game we call life. You get bad breaks from good shots; you get good breaks from bad shots - but you have to play where the ball lies.

name: Sam Snead
quote: If a lot of people gripped a knife and fork the way they do a golf club, they’d starve to death.

name: Jackie Burke Jnr
quote: Bad putting stems from thinking 'how' instead of 'where.

name: David Leadbetter
quote: The ultimate goal is to convert your athletic swing to pure instinct rather than conscious thought.

name: Butch Harmon
quote: It's much easier to have one swing thought than many.
